column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I love museums. Especially this one
column2: I love art. No matter how many times I stop in
column3: I am truly in love with this building. Just walking up the stairs
column4: I feel a transformation and once I am enter those doors
column5: I feel alive. This location is perfect location in Downtown Chicago. The lions in front of the building are always a welcoming sight. The entire building is amazing
column6: the grounds are well kept. A perfect summer or spring or late fall is a perfect time to visit. You could never go wrong with a visit. The Art Institute of Chicago stands out. I have paid admission to enter and it is worth. But also you gotta love the free museum days
column7: were the admission is free for IL residents. Either way being here is a lifetime and beautiful experience. Thank you.
